text.Prompt:
Product name:
Lively "Happy Birthday" Party Cone Hats - 8 Count

Product specifications:
Birthday party cone hats
Size: 6" high and 4.25" wide base
Strong strings
Sold in a pack of 8
Match with any themed party
Suitable for both boys and girls

Product description:
text.Response A: This GlassAlike® Quad Decora Acrylic Mirror Switch Plate is made from 3/16 inches thick premium acrylic mirror with polished beveled edges. It has a light greenish tint that resembles glass. To make this switch plate flat on a non-mirrored, non-glass surface, use Mirart's Acrylic Switch Plate Gasket -Quad. The switch plate is 9-5/8 inches wide x 6 inches high.
text.Response B: Lively "Happy Birthday" Party Cone Hats are suitable for both boys and girls and are perfect for any themed birthday party. They come in a pack of 8 and measure 6" high and 4.25" wide base. The strong strings ensure they will stay on your head as you celebrate!

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

318.displayed_text:
Prompt

Product name:
Lively "Happy Birthday" Party Cone Hats - 8 Count

Product specifications:
Birthday party cone hats
Size: 6" high and 4.25" wide base
Strong strings
Sold in a pack of 8
Match with any themed party
Suitable for both boys and girls

Product description:

Response A

This GlassAlike® Quad Decora Acrylic Mirror Switch Plate is made from 3/16 inches thick premium acrylic mirror with polished beveled edges. It has a light greenish tint that resembles glass. To make this switch plate flat on a non-mirrored, non-glass surface, use Mirart's Acrylic Switch Plate Gasket -Quad. The switch plate is 9-5/8 inches wide x 6 inches high.

Response B

Lively "Happy Birthday" Party Cone Hats are suitable for both boys and girls and are perfect for any themed birthday party. They come in a pack of 8 and measure 6" high and 4.25" wide base. The strong strings ensure they will stay on your head as you celebrate!
